column5: 1948 remodeled home, modern, newly built upstairs guest studio located in the heart of Austin, Texas. This house was built in 2015, has hardwood floors, central heat and air, air jet bath tub and tempurpedic mattress. Note to pet owners: I will consider guests bringing one pet however if guest leave they most kennel pet. My rules for pets are as follows:  $50 non refundable pet deposit no barking potty trained no chewing
